title: New: Inner Oceans – Ready Your Ghost
body:
Photo: Luca Venter

Opening with the gentle strumming of a silky guitar and the sandpaper rough vocals of Griff Snyder, **Inner Oceans** debut track _Ready Your Ghost_ opens out into a Jesus & Mary Chain style shoegaze inspired number.

Swelling at points, before retreating back to the bare bones of the track, it’s a mightily impressive first outing. Check out _Ready Your Ghost_ below, and keep your eyes on their [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/Inneroceans) page for more (Premiered via [NoFoP](http://www.nofearofpop.net/blog/inner-oceans-ready-your-ghost-exclusive))
